# uni-checkbox



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute       | Description                                                                | Type      | Default     |
| --------------- | --------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`       | `checked`       | The checked state of the checkbox                                          | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled`      | `disabled`      | When true, the checkbox is marked as disabled and state cannot be modified | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `indeterminate` | `indeterminate` | Puts the checkbox in an indeterminate state ( [-] )                        | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `readonly`      | `readonly`      | Prevents the state from being modified                                     | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `value`         | `value`         | HTML Form value. This is not the checked state, use checked instead        | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event       | Description                            | Type                   |
| ----------- | -------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `uniChange` | Emitted when checkbox value is changed | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |
